Name: Population Size
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of samples drawn from the posterior distribution at each generation.

Name: Max Chain Length
Configuration Settings.Description: Chains longer than Max Chain Length will be broken and samples will be duplicated (replacing samples associated with a chain length of 0). Max Chain Length of 1 corresponds to the BASIS algorithm [Wu2018].

Name: Default Burn In
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of additional TMCMC steps per chain per generation.

Name: Per Generation Burn In
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of additional TMCMC steps per chain at specified generations (this property will overwrite Default Burn In at specified generations).

Name: Target Coefficient Of Variation
Configuration Settings.Description: Target coefficient of variation of the plausibility weights to update the annealing exponent $ho$ (by default, this value is 1.00 as suggested in [Ching2007]).

Name: Covariance Scaling
Configuration Settings.Description: Scaling factor $ eta^2$ of Covariance Matrix (by default, this value is 0.04 as suggested in [Ching2007]).

Name: Min Annealing Exponent Update
Configuration Settings.Description: Minimum increment of the exponent $ho$. This parameter prevents TMCMC from stalling.

Name: Max Annealing Exponent Update
Configuration Settings.Description: Maximum increment of the exponent $ho$ (by default, this value is 1.0 (inactive)).

Name: Target Annealing Exponent
Termination Criteria.Description: Determines the annealing exponent $rho$ to achieve before termination. TMCMC converges if $rho$ equals 1.0.

Name: Max Generations
Termination Criteria.Description: Determines how many generations to run before stopping execution. Execution can be resumed at a later moment.

Name: Max Model Evaluations
Termination Criteria.Description: Determines how many computational model evaluations to run before stopping execution. Execution can be resumed at a later moment.

Name: Prior Distribution
Variables Configuration.Description: Prior distribution of the parameters. Distribution to sample the first generation. Also it is evaluated for each sample during the calculation of the posterior.

Name: Current Burn In
Internal Settings.Description: Actual placeholder for burn in steps per generation, calculated from Burn In Default, Burn In and Current Generation.

Name: Chain Pending Fitness
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates that the model evaluation for the chain is pending.

Name: Chain Candidates
Internal Settings.Description: Candidates of all chains to evaluate in order to advance the markov chains.

Name: Chain Candidates LogLikelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: The loglikelihoods of the chain candidates.

Name: Chain Candidates LogPriors
Internal Settings.Description: The logpriors of the chain candidates.

Name: Chain Leaders
Internal Settings.Description: Leading parameters of all chains to be accepted.

Name: Chain Leaders LogLikelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: The loglikelihoods of the chain leaders.

Name: Chain Leaders LogPriors
Internal Settings.Description: The logpriors of the chain leaders.

Name: Finished Chains Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of finished chains.

Name: Current Chain Step
Internal Settings.Description: The current execution step for every chain.

Name: Chain Lengths
Internal Settings.Description: Lengths for each of the chains.

Name: Coefficient Of Variation
Internal Settings.Description: Actual coefficient of variation after $rho$ has beed updated.

Name: Chain Count
Internal Settings.Description: Unique selections after resampling stage.

Name: Annealing Exponent
Internal Settings.Description: Exponent of the likelihood. If $rho$ equals 1.0, TMCMC converged.

Name: Accepted Samples Count
Internal Settings.Description: Accepted candidates after proposal.

Name: LogEvidence
Internal Settings.Description: Calculated logEvidence of the model.

Name: Proposals Acceptance Rate
Internal Settings.Description: Acceptance rate calculated from accepted samples.

Name: Selection Acceptance Rate
Internal Settings.Description: Acceptance rate calculated from unique samples (chain count) after recombination.

Name: Covariance Matrix
Internal Settings.Description: Sample covariance of the current leaders updated at every generation.

Name: Mean Theta
Internal Settings.Description: Mean of the current leaders updated at every generation.

Name: Sample Database
Internal Settings.Description: Parameters stored in the database (taken from the chain leaders).

Name: Sample Fitness Database
Internal Settings.Description: Fitness of the parameters stored in the database.

Name: Sample LogPrior Database
Internal Settings.Description: Log priors of the samples stored in the database.

Name: Local Covariance Matrices
Internal Settings.Description: Local covariance matrices of chain leaders.
